posts.title: Python Encapsulation: Why Properties Beat Getter/Setter Methods
posts.excerpt: Learn how Python's approach to encapsulation differs from other languages and why it's actually more powerful

_instructions.note: Add your Medium articles here. Each post should have:

fields.title: Article title as it appears on Medium
fields.url: Full URL to your Medium article
fields.imageUrl: Optional - URL to article's featured image
fields.tags: Array of display tags (shown on card)
fields.categories: Array of filter categories (lowercase, matches blog filters)
fields.seriesName: Optional - If part of a series
fields.featured: Boolean - true to show at top of page
